original_text: And when they were come to Jerusalem, they were received of the church, and of the apostles and elders, and they declared all things that God had done with them.
korean_text: 예루살렘에 이르러 교회와 사도와 장로들에게 영접을 받고 하나님이 자기들과 함께 계셔 행하신 모든 일을 말하매

sentences.original_text: And when they were come to Jerusalem
they were received of the church
and of the apostles and elders
that God had done with them
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들과 함께 행하신 모든 일을
